ISSUE.TITLE: Blog posts. Include only one language in multilingual sitemaps
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.60.4 The issue is described at https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/97693/multilingual-blog-post-sitemap-double-language-v4602 So we have to: 1. There should be only one <url> record (for one active language) 2. Do not include xhtml:link rel="alternate" line For example, in this example on our forums the sitemap should have the following record ``` <url> <loc>{website}/en/wonderful-blog</loc> <changefreq>weekly</changefreq> <lastmod>2022-09-14</lastmod> </url> ```
